nodes.text: Orbital One was a tibanna gas mining station located in orbit of Pandem Nai. Forces of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing led by Colonel Shakara Nuress took control of Pandem Nai and Orbital One. When the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron led an attack on the 204th's forces, the station's reactor was detonated, causing Orbital One to break apart and fall towards the surface of the planet.
